00039 #include "dataMoveDgemm.h"
00040 #include "defDC66.h"
00041 
00042 // moving B' from L2 to L1
00043 void dataMoveBTDgemm(double * restrict dst, double * restrict src, int k)
00044 {
00045   int kCnt;
00046   int srcAddr;
00047   int dstAddr;
00048   _nassert((unsigned int) src%8 == 0);
00049   _nassert((unsigned int) dst%8 == 0);
00050 
00051   srcAddr = 0;
00052   dstAddr = 0;
00053   for(kCnt=0; kCnt<k; kCnt++)
00054   {
00055         dst[dstAddr]   = src[srcAddr];
00056         dst[dstAddr+1] = src[srcAddr+1];
00057         dst[dstAddr+2] = src[srcAddr+2];
00058         dst[dstAddr+3] = src[srcAddr+3];
00059 
00060         dstAddr += N_KERNEL_D;
00061         srcAddr += NPARTITION_D;
00062 
00063   }
00064 }
00065 
00066 // moving B from L2 to L1 (needs transpose)
00067 void dataMoveBDgemm(double * restrict dst, double * restrict src, int k)
00068 {
00069   int kCnt;
00070   int srcAddr0, srcAddr1, srcAddr2, srcAddr3;
00071   int dstAddr;
00072 
00073   srcAddr0 = 0;
00074   srcAddr1 = KPARTITION_D/*k*/;
00075   srcAddr2 = 2*KPARTITION_D/*k*/;
00076   srcAddr3 = 3*KPARTITION_D/*k*/;
00077   dstAddr  = 0;
00078 
00079   _nassert((unsigned int) src%8 == 0);
00080   _nassert((unsigned int) dst%8 == 0);
00081 
00082   for(kCnt=0; kCnt<((k>>1)<<1); kCnt++)
00083   {
00084         double f0, f1, f2, f3;
00085         f0=src[srcAddr0];
00086         f1=src[srcAddr1];
00087         f2=src[srcAddr2];
00088         f3=src[srcAddr3];
00089 
00090         srcAddr0++;
00091         srcAddr1++;
00092         srcAddr2++;
00093         srcAddr3++;
00094 
00095         dst[dstAddr] = f0;
00096         dst[dstAddr+1] = f1;
00097         dst[dstAddr+2] = f2;
00098         dst[dstAddr+3] = f3;
00099 
00100         dstAddr += N_KERNEL_D;
00101   }
00102   if((k&1)==1) // odd k; one more value to take care
00103   {
00104         double f0, f1, f2, f3;
00105         f0=src[srcAddr0];
00106         f1=src[srcAddr1];
00107         f2=src[srcAddr2];
00108         f3=src[srcAddr3];
00109 
00110         dst[dstAddr] = f0;
00111         dst[dstAddr+1] = f1;
00112         dst[dstAddr+2] = f2;
00113         dst[dstAddr+3] = f3;
00114   }
00115 }
00116 
00117 // moving data from A to format needed for kernel
00118 void dataMoveADgemm(double * restrict dst, double * restrict src, int m, int k, int mPartition)
00119 {
00120   int kCnt, mCnt, mLeft;
00121   int srcAddr, dstAddr;
00122 
00123   mLeft=m-((m>>2)<<2);
00124 
00125   _nassert((unsigned int) src%8 == 0);
00126   _nassert((unsigned int) dst%8 == 0);
00127   for(kCnt=0;kCnt<k;kCnt++){
00128         for(mCnt=0;mCnt<(m>>2);mCnt++)
00129         {
00130           double f0, f1, f2, f3;
00131           srcAddr = (kCnt*mPartition/*m*/)+(mCnt<<2);
00132           dstAddr = (mCnt*(KPARTITION_D/*k*/<<2))+(kCnt<<2);
00133           // load M_KERNEL floats sequentially
00134           f0 = src[srcAddr];
00135           f1 = src[srcAddr+1];
00136           f2 = src[srcAddr+2];
00137           f3 = src[srcAddr+3];
00138 
00139           // push M_KERNEL floats to desired loc
00140       dst[dstAddr] = f0;
00141       dst[dstAddr+1] = f1;
00142       dst[dstAddr+2] = f2;
00143       dst[dstAddr+3] = f3;
00144         }
00145         // leftover in m dimension of A
00146         srcAddr = kCnt*mPartition/*m*/+((m>>2)<<2);
00147         dstAddr = ((m>>2)*(KPARTITION_D/*k*/<<2))+(kCnt<<2);
00148     for(mCnt=0;mCnt<mLeft;mCnt++)
00149     {
00150       dst[dstAddr+mCnt] = src[srcAddr+mCnt];
00151     }
00152   }
00153 }
00154 
00155 // moving data from A' to format needed for kernel
00156 void dataMoveATDgemm(double * restrict dst, double * restrict src, int m, int k, int kPartition)
00157 {
00158   int mCnt, kCnt, mLeft;
00159   int srcAddr, dstAddr;
00160 
00161   mLeft=m-((m>>2)<<2);
00162   _nassert((unsigned int) src%8 == 0);
00163   _nassert((unsigned int) dst%8 == 0);
00164   for(kCnt=0;kCnt<(k>>1);kCnt++){
00165         for(mCnt=0;mCnt<(m>>2);mCnt++)
00166         {
00167           double f00, f01, f02, f03;
00168           double f10, f11, f12, f13;
00169           srcAddr = (mCnt<<2)*kPartition/*k*/+(kCnt<<1);
00170           dstAddr = (mCnt*(KPARTITION_D/*k*/<<2))+(kCnt<<3);
00171 
00172           // load 2 x M_KERNEL floats
00173           f00 = src[srcAddr];
00174           f10 = src[srcAddr+1];
00175           f01 = src[srcAddr+kPartition/*k*/];
00176           f11 = src[srcAddr+kPartition/*k*/+1];
00177           f02 = src[srcAddr+2*kPartition/*k*/];
00178           f12 = src[srcAddr+2*kPartition/*k*/+1];
00179           f03 = src[srcAddr+3*kPartition/*k*/];
00180           f13 = src[srcAddr+3*kPartition/*k*/+1];
00181 
00182           // push 2 x M_KERNEL floats to desired loc
00183       dst[dstAddr]   = f00;
00184       dst[dstAddr+1] = f01;
00185       dst[dstAddr+2] = f02;
00186       dst[dstAddr+3] = f03;
00187       dst[dstAddr+4] = f10;
00188       dst[dstAddr+5] = f11;
00189       dst[dstAddr+6] = f12;
00190       dst[dstAddr+7] = f13;
00191         }
00192         // leftover in m dimension of A
00193         srcAddr = ((m>>2)<<2)*kPartition/*k*/+(kCnt<<1);
00194         dstAddr = ((m>>2)*(KPARTITION_D/*k*/<<2))+(kCnt<<3);
00195     for(mCnt=0;mCnt<mLeft;mCnt++)
00196     {
00197       dst[dstAddr+mCnt] = src[srcAddr+mCnt*kPartition/*k*/];
00198       dst[dstAddr+mCnt+4] = src[srcAddr+mCnt*kPartition/*k*/+1];
00199     }
00200   }
00201 
00202   if((k&1)==1) // one more left in k dimension
00203   {
00204         kCnt = k-1;
00205         for(mCnt=0;mCnt<(m>>2);mCnt++)
00206         {
00207           double f00, f01, f02, f03;
00208           int srcAddr = (mCnt<<2)*kPartition/*k*/+kCnt;
00209           int dstAddr = (mCnt*(KPARTITION_D/*k*/<<2))+(kCnt<<2);
00210 
00211           // load 1 x M_KERNEL floats
00212           f00 = src[srcAddr];
00213           f01 = src[srcAddr+kPartition/*k*/];
00214           f02 = src[srcAddr+2*kPartition/*k*/];
00215           f03 = src[srcAddr+3*kPartition/*k*/];
00216 
00217           // push 2 x M_KERNEL floats to desired loc
00218           dst[dstAddr]   = f00;
00219           dst[dstAddr+1] = f01;
00220           dst[dstAddr+2] = f02;
00221           dst[dstAddr+3] = f03;
00222         }
00223         // leftover in m dimension of A
00224         // leftover in m dimension of A
00225         srcAddr = ((m>>2)<<2)*kPartition/*k*/+(kCnt);
00226         dstAddr = ((m>>2)*(KPARTITION_D/*k*/<<2))+(kCnt<<2);
00227     for(mCnt=0;mCnt<mLeft;mCnt++)
00228     {
00229       dst[dstAddr+mCnt] = src[srcAddr+mCnt*kPartition/*k*/];
00230       dst[dstAddr+mCnt+4] = src[srcAddr+mCnt*kPartition/*k*/+1];
00231     }
00232   }
00233 }
